created_at.description: The date and time when the ticket field was created.

title_in_portal.description: The title of the ticket field visible in the portal.

visible_in_portal.description: Indicates whether the ticket field is visible in the portal or not.

collapsed_for_agents.description: Specifies if the ticket field is collapsed for agents.

regexp_for_validation.description: Regular expression for validation of the ticket field value.

title.description: The title of the ticket field.

editable_in_portal.description: Indicates whether the ticket field is editable in the portal or not.

raw_title_in_portal.description: The raw title of the ticket field visible in the portal.

raw_description.description: The raw description of the ticket field.

custom_field_options.description: Options for custom ticket field with properties like default, id, name, raw_name, and value.

name.description: The name of the custom field option.

value.description: The value associated with the custom field option.

id.description: The unique identifier of the custom field option.

default.description: Indicates if this custom field value is the default one.

raw_name.description: The raw name of the custom field option.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the ticket field was last updated.

tag.description: Tag associated with the ticket field.

removable.description: Specifies if the ticket field is removable.

active.description: Indicates whether the ticket field is active or not.

raw_title.description: The raw title of the ticket field.

required.description: Indicates if the ticket field is required.

id.description: The unique identifier of the ticket field.

agent_description.description: The description of the ticket field visible to agents.

required_in_portal.description: Specifies if the ticket field is required in the portal.

system_field_options.description: Options for the system field associated with the ticket field.

custom_statuses.description: Custom statuses associated with the ticket field.

key.description: Key associated with the ticket field.

sub_type_id.description: The subtype identifier of the ticket field.
